column2:
"<%me>...
listen, I need to ask you a favor..."
"You're aquainted with Dr. Aki, right? Could you please introduce me to her?"
"Not only a lead researcher, but also as an ARKS member. I've always looked up to her, and would love a word..."
"1. ...Is she really worth admiring?"
"2. Don't you see her on the job?"
"Of course! For the sake of her research, she actually sets foot on and experiences locales firsthand..."
"Her proactivity, her determination... I admire that as a fellow researcher."
"Ah, well... yes, but..."
"I um... I tried to talk to her, but every time I get cold feet."
"As nervous as I am to meet her, I worry about being disrespectful... I know, it's pitiful."
"...Oh my. I'm no one that important, you know."
"P-professor!! What are you doing here??"
"Light showed me this unique report about about Lilipa's climate and ecology, you see."
"I've been wanting to have a word with its author."
"I'd have never imagined you were already acquaintences with <%me> here."
"P-professor Aki, I'm Rogio! The pleasure is all mine!!"
"...Please stop that. I am not a fan of formalities."
"And one more thing: Please stop looking up to me. Adoration is the death of innovation."
"We're both researchers. We're equals. Right, Rogio?"
"...I-indeed!"
"So back on track, how did you manage to compile such scrupulous data on Lilipa's climate?"
"Ah, that's simple. I actually sojurned on Lilipa for a time, and it was during that visit I gathered my findings..."
